title: Lethality Tiamat Item
body: I remember in mid October Rioters were discusssing the idea of a lethality Tiamat item. Will it ever be coming in to the game? If so when?

replies.body: Didn't we just get a new Lethality item? {{item:3181}} You want another one already?

> [{quoted}](name=HB9 REFORMED,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pM11jMP6,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-12-13T01:55:02.327+0000)
>
> I remember in mid October Rioters were discusssing the idea of a lethality Tiamat item. Will it ever be coming in to the game? If so when?

I'd rather have a AP tiamat item. Yes Melee Only. So this way AP bruiser can actually be a thing and have items.
they gutted jungle, they gutted lethality, god riot just keeps fucking everything up
